FAIL_TO_PASS: when negatable boolean flag not specified then value is true
when boolean combo not specified then value is undefined
when boolean combo not specified then value is default
when negated and default string then value is default
when use negated options then option values reset
when env undefined and no cli then option true
when env undefined and no cli then option undefined
when program has yes/no not specified then error
when invalid option choice then shows help
when boolean combo not specified then value is false
when use increaseVerbosity example then option value resets
